name: Penmode3
body:
# Penmode3 New Year, new Penmode! And now it's ready to hit the "cloud" *** #### How Do I install Penmode3? Read the [Readme](http://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode3) #### How Penmode3 works? Read the [wiki](http://github.com/TheZ3ro/penmode3/wiki) *** ### You can't use the name "penmode" in your project!! Why? It's your trademark? I don't think so. I've started develop penmode since its first line.
The Team split up, but I think that continue the project with its true name is not a shame. Thanks. TheZero, ex-PH#0S Team Member
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
